House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00526
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING CERTAIN PROVISIONS OF THE CHARTER OF THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION TO ABOLISH THE IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES IMPOSED ON FARMERS
ABSTRACT : Abolishes the irrigation fee to make irrigation services available for all farmers.
